segments.description: You can create a line sparkline, column sparkline, or winloss sparkline by using the following functions in a formula: =LINESPARKLINE(data, dataOrientation, dateAxisData?, dateAxisOrientation?, setting?), =COLUMNSPARKLINE(data, dataOrientation, dateAxisData?, dateAxisOrientation?, setting?), =WINLOSSSPARKLINE(data, dataOrientation, dateAxisData?, dateAxisOrientation?, setting?).
The functions have the following parameters:
data: A range reference that represents sparkline data, such as "A1:C3".
dataOrientation: A number that represents the sparkline data orientation. One of the following:
dateAxisData: (optional) A range reference that represents the sparkline date axis data, such as "D1:F3".
dateAxisOrientation: (optional) A number that represents the sparkline date axis orientation. One of the following:
setting: (optional) A string with JSON format; each item keeps the same definition as GcSpread.Sheets.SparklineSetting.
